snippet: The top-ranked players grabbed leads in the United States Championship, the Sigeman & Company event and the 47th Capablanca Memorial tournament.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that the top-ranked players have taken early leads in three elite tournaments--the United States Championship in St Louis, the Sigeman & Co event in Sweden and the 47th Capablanca Memorial tournament in Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked players grabbed leads in the United States Championship, the Sigeman & Company event and the 47th Capablanca Memorial tournament.

headline.seo: Chess: Good Starts for Nakamura, Caruana and Ivanchuk
headline.main: Fast Starts for Top Players at Three Elite Tournaments
headline.print_headline: Fast Starts for Top Players At Three Elite Tournaments
